https://tmrev.io/movie/166746-Alien Boy: The Life and Death of James Chasse 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Alien Boy: The Life and Death of James Chasse is a feature length documentary film about one mans struggle with schizophrenia and the extraordinary brutality that ended his life. It is the story of a city in denial that was forced to face the truth and learn, grow and change as a result. Alien Boy explores issues of impunity, police brutality, and mental illness. Alien Boy: The Life and Death of James Chasse
